name: Morestrap
body:
### Welcome to Morestrap. Morestrap is OpenSource project, MoreStrap made to develop Bootstrap project with lots of capabilities. Morestrap needs developers to HELP for next versions. ### About Morestrap is a CSS3 freamwork + some JavaScript files but it's not a freamwork itself (at least not now), for using that you need to load Bootstrap CSS files first. ### Get start with Morestrap `` ### Starter HTML `

Hello, world!

` ### Author Morestrap is made with in Depok,Indonesia by Mohammad Nicjoo (Robert). Morestrap is 100% OpenSource project to help you with your Bootstrap projects. In morestrap I did not change any of default Bootstrap classes/Id's or whatever else, the only thing I did is added many cool stufs to Bootstrap and made it more better (I guess so). ### Support or Contact Having trouble with Morestrap? [contact me on twitter](https://twitter.com/myvivaid) or send me [E-mail](mailto:robertnicjoo@outlook.com) and Iâ€™ll help you sort it out. > Updates coming soon...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
